thread.title: Hip hop singer Lauryn Hill to perform in UK for album anniversary tour

title: Hip hop singer Lauryn Hill to perform in UK for album anniversary tour
text:
Hip hop singer Lauryn Hill to perform in UK for album anniversary tour 10:45am EDT - 00:26
Hip hop musician Lauryn Hill is due to perform in the UK for the anniversary of her acclaimed album ''The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill''. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Hip hop musician Lauryn Hill is due to perform in the UK for the anniversary of her acclaimed album "The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill". Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2GM9gRW
